featureTitle: Simple Accounting Software for Dev Startup
summary: Philippines compliance research completed; identified 8 feature changes and 3 new requirements, adding ~90 hours to MVP

notes.researchTopic: Philippines accounting, payroll, and tax compliance requirements
keyFindings: Mandatory government contributions: SSS (15%), PhilHealth (5%), Pag-IBIG (4%) = 24% total
13th month pay is legally required (not in US system)
VAT registration mandatory at â‚±3M revenue (12% rate)
BIR has specific invoice format requirements + e-invoicing mandate
Philippines-specific payroll providers: Salarium, Sprout Solutions, PayrollHero
impactedFeatures: PM-005: Automated Payroll Tax Filing (+40% complexity)
SB-006: Sales Tax Calculation (upgraded from Could-Have to Should-Have)
INF-008: Data Backup & Retention (reduced to 5 years)
ESS-004: View Tax Forms (replace W-2 with BIR Form 2316)
criticalResearchGaps: Which payroll provider has best API (Salarium vs Sprout vs PayrollHero)?
Is BIR Electronic Invoicing System API available for third-party integration?
Do SSS/PhilHealth/Pag-IBIG have online submission APIs?
Philippines banking API options for payroll disbursement?
